/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a two-lane road that stretches into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on both sides. The road, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun, positioned in the top right corner of the image, shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a soft light. The image is taken from a low angle, making the road appear as if it's leading towards an unseen destination. The perspective gives a sense of depth and scale to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall composition of the image suggests a peaceful and idyllic setting.
